titleStmt.title: Divers serious cautions plainly shewing the unlawfulness of the oath of abjuration, and that (for several reasons) a branch of the old royal family may more necessarily tend to the happy settlement of these three distracted nations then any other new government whatsoever.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: stained, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
